p: Given the considerable reduction in viral spread described earlier, we checked the effect of PA24, PA63, and PA104 on VACV entry. We infected cells with VACV WR-Luc at RT, which allowed virus attachment but not entry, washed cells to remove unbound virus, and subsequently added the inhibitors ( Figure 2A). After a 2-h incubation at 37Â°C, we determined luciferase expression, controlled by a synthetic early/late promoter, as a surrogate for early protein synthesis. As shown in Supplementary Figure S1A, input luciferase activity was very low, suggesting that the RLU values in our assay were largely attributable to viral entry and gene expression, rather than prepackaged luciferase.
